Project.NAME: ElTool
Project.keywords: AutoCAD API, C#, .NET, AutoCAD 2021+, EOM, block mapping, cable tracing, specification, XData, Excel
Project.annotation: Operational graph synced with current codebase, including full ribbon command exposure, stable settings paths, and command usage documentation.

M-ENTRY-COMMANDS.NAME: CommandEntryPoints
M-ENTRY-COMMANDS.purpose: Command registration and dispatch for existing and new operational commands.
M-ENTRY-COMMANDS.depends: M-MAP-ORCHESTRATOR, M-TRACE-ORCHESTRATOR, M-SPEC-ORCHESTRATOR, M-SELECTION, M-EXPORT, M-SETTINGS, M-XDATA, M-CAD-CONTEXT, M-LOGGING, M-LICENSE, M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-UI, M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-VM

fn-registerCommands.PURPOSE: Register command methods in AutoCAD runtime

fn-cmd-EOM_ЭКСПОРТ_EXCEL.PURPOSE: Run export to Excel INPUT command

fn-cmd-EOM_ИМПОРТ_EXCEL.PURPOSE: Run import from Excel OUTPUT command

fn-cmd-EOM_ПОСТРОИТЬ_ОЛС.PURPOSE: Run OLS build command from imported output

fn-cmd-EOM_СВЯЗАТЬ_ВИЗУАЛИЗАЦИЮ.PURPOSE: Bind selected OLS source block signature to visualization block

fn-cmd-EOM_НАЗНАЧИТЬ_ГРУППУ.PURPOSE: Bulk assign line group to selection

fn-cmd-EOM_LAYOUTCFG.PURPOSE: Open panel layout configuration UI editor

M-CAD-CONTEXT.NAME: CadContextAdapter
M-CAD-CONTEXT.purpose: Unified document, database, editor, transactions, event subscriptions, and effective linetype resolution.

fn-subscribeObjectAppended.PURPOSE: Subscribe to object creation in document

M-SELECTION.NAME: SelectionService
M-SELECTION.purpose: Entity selection and type validation for blocks and cable lines.

fn-selectByIssue.PURPOSE: Select object from validation issue list

M-SETTINGS.NAME: SettingsRepository
M-SETTINGS.purpose: Read and validate mapping profiles and install-type rules from JSON configs.

fn-loadInstallTypeRules.PURPOSE: Load install type rules with priorities

fn-loadPanelLayoutMap.PURPOSE: Load selector and legacy OLS-to-layout visualization map from PanelLayoutMap.json

type-PanelLayoutSelectorRule.PURPOSE: OLS source signature (block+visibility) to layout block mapping rule

type-PanelLayoutMapRule.PURPOSE: Legacy OLS device (АППАРАТ) fallback mapping rule

M-ATTRIBUTES.NAME: BlockAttributeService
M-ATTRIBUTES.purpose: Read and write Russian block attributes and validate required load fields.

M-BLOCK-REPLACE.NAME: BlockReplacementService
M-BLOCK-REPLACE.purpose: Replace a source block with mapped target preserving insertion and rotation.

M-MAP-ORCHESTRATOR.NAME: MapWorkflowOrchestrator
M-MAP-ORCHESTRATOR.purpose: Execute UC-MAP-01 workflow from selection to replacement summary.

M-COORDINATES.NAME: CoordinateNormalizationService
M-COORDINATES.purpose: Coordinate system normalization from UCS to WCS.

M-CABLE-CALC.NAME: CableLengthCalculator
M-CABLE-CALC.purpose: Compute cable totals and resolve install type by linetype/layer rules.
M-CABLE-CALC.depends: M-COORDINATES, M-ATTRIBUTES, M-XDATA, M-LOGGING, M-SETTINGS, M-INSTALL-TYPE-RESOLVER

fn-resolveInstallType.PURPOSE: Resolve install type with priority and default

fn-aggregateByGroup.PURPOSE: Aggregate by ЩИТ and ГРУППА without connectivity analysis

M-XDATA.NAME: XDataService
M-XDATA.purpose: Read and write EOM_DATA and line group metadata using RegApp ELTOOL with fallback storage.

fn-setActiveGroup.PURPOSE: Set active group for current session/document

M-TRACE-ORCHESTRATOR.NAME: TraceWorkflowOrchestrator
M-TRACE-ORCHESTRATOR.purpose: Execute UC-TRACE-01 and EOM_ОБНОВИТЬ workflow including grouped aggregation and install-type distribution.
M-TRACE-ORCHESTRATOR.depends: M-SELECTION, M-COORDINATES, M-CABLE-CALC, M-XDATA, M-ATTRIBUTES, M-SETTINGS, M-LOGGING

type-GroupAggregate.PURPOSE: ЩИТ/ГРУППА aggregate model with power and lengths

M-AGGREGATION.NAME: SpecificationAggregationService
M-AGGREGATION.purpose: Aggregate grouped data for specification and produce validation issues.

fn-validateData.PURPOSE: Validate project data and produce issue list

M-EXPORT.NAME: SpecificationExportService
M-EXPORT.purpose: Export to AutoCAD/CSV and integrate Excel INPUT/OUTPUT via IExcelGateway abstraction.

M-SPEC-ORCHESTRATOR.NAME: SpecWorkflowOrchestrator
M-SPEC-ORCHESTRATOR.purpose: Execute UC-SPEC-01 and Excel-driven outputs: ведомость, OLS, panel layout, and checks.
M-SPEC-ORCHESTRATOR.depends: M-AGGREGATION, M-EXPORT, M-CAD-CONTEXT, M-SETTINGS, M-LOGGING, M-SELECTION

fn-buildOlsModel.PURPOSE: Prepare OLS model from Excel OUTPUT

fn-selectOlsEntities.PURPOSE: Select OLS blocks manually for layout source

fn-parseOlsDeviceAttributes.PURPOSE: Parse selected OLS blocks with signature (effective name + visibility), optional АППАРАТ and МОДУЛЕЙ

fn-mapOlsDeviceToLayoutBlock.PURPOSE: Resolve layout visualization block by selector rules with legacy АППАРАТ fallback

fn-buildPanelLayoutModel.PURPOSE: Prepare panel layout model from mapped OLS devices

fn-drawPanelLayout.PURPOSE: Render DIN-row panel layout by inserting mapped layout blocks

fn-bindPanelLayoutVisualization.PURPOSE: Persist source OLS signature to layout block selector rule in PanelLayoutMap.json

fn-reportSkippedOlsDevices.PURPOSE: Log skipped OLS objects with reasons

M-LOGGING.NAME: LoggingService
M-LOGGING.purpose: Structured diagnostics for workflows and adapters.

fn-reportIssues.PURPOSE: Write issue list with object links

M-RIBBON.NAME: RibbonBuilder
M-RIBBON.purpose: Build and maintain the ЭОМ ПРО ribbon tab with grouped command buttons and operational tooltips.

fn-buildRibbon.PURPOSE: Create ribbon tab and operational panels

fn-createButton.PURPOSE: Create command button with mixed tooltip guidance

M-DOCS-COMMANDS.NAME: CommandsGuide
M-DOCS-COMMANDS.purpose: Provide operator-facing command manual with prerequisites and step-by-step usage.

fn-command-matrix.PURPOSE: Describe each command, prerequisites, and result

fn-quick-start.PURPOSE: Define minimal startup flow for first use

M-CONFIG.NAME: PluginConfig
M-CONFIG.purpose: Canonical constants for Russian attributes, commands, EOM_DATA keys, install-type rules, and Excel contract.

M-ASSEMBLY-REGISTRATION.NAME: AssemblyRegistration
M-ASSEMBLY-REGISTRATION.purpose: Register assembly-level ExtensionApplication and CommandClass for AutoCAD loader.

fn-registerExtension.PURPOSE: Register extension entry point and command container

M-PLUGIN-LIFECYCLE.NAME: PluginApp
M-PLUGIN-LIFECYCLE.purpose: Initialize plugin lifecycle and ribbon bootstrap on AutoCAD startup.

M-EXCEL-GATEWAY.NAME: ExcelGateway
M-EXCEL-GATEWAY.purpose: Provide Excel INPUT/OUTPUT gateway abstraction and CSV fallback implementation.

fn-writeInputRows.PURPOSE: Write INPUT rows to template-compatible output

fn-readOutputRows.PURPOSE: Read OUTPUT rows from template-compatible source

M-HARDWARE-PROBE.NAME: HardwareProbeAdapter
M-HARDWARE-PROBE.purpose: Read machine hardware fingerprint for licensing checks.

M-JSON-ADAPTER.NAME: JsonAdapter
M-JSON-ADAPTER.purpose: Serialize and deserialize plugin models using Newtonsoft.Json.

M-MODELS.NAME: DomainModels
M-MODELS.purpose: Define immutable domain models shared by mapping, trace, spec, layout, and licensing flows.

type-DomainModels.PURPOSE: Shared record and enum model set

M-INSTALL-TYPE-RESOLVER.NAME: InstallTypeResolver
M-INSTALL-TYPE-RESOLVER.purpose: Resolve install type by linetype/layer rules with deterministic priority.

fn-resolveInstallType.PURPOSE: Resolve install type by prioritized rules

M-LICENSE.NAME: LicenseService
M-LICENSE.purpose: Validate command execution license state using hardware fingerprint and settings.

M-MAP-CONFIG-VM.NAME: MappingConfigWindowViewModel
M-MAP-CONFIG-VM.purpose: Provide mapping configuration state, validation, and persistence commands.

fn-loadProfile.PURPOSE: Load mapping profile into editable collection

M-MAP-CONFIG-UI.NAME: MappingConfigWindow
M-MAP-CONFIG-UI.purpose: Render mapping configuration WPF window and bind it to view-model.

M-GLOBAL-USINGS.NAME: GlobalUsings
M-GLOBAL-USINGS.purpose: Define global using directives shared across plugin compilation units.

M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-VM.NAME: PanelLayoutConfigWindowViewModel
M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-VM.purpose: Provide editable panel layout mapping state and persistence logic for selector and legacy rules.

fn-loadMap.PURPOSE: Load panel layout map into UI collections

fn-pickAndAddSelectorRule.PURPOSE: Pick SOURCE and LAYOUT blocks from drawing and append rule

fn-saveMap.PURPOSE: Validate and save panel layout map configuration

M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-UI.NAME: PanelLayoutConfigWindow
M-PANEL-LAYOUT-CONFIG-UI.purpose: Render panel layout configuration window and execute drawing pick actions from UI controls.

fn-buildLayout.PURPOSE: Build WPF layout for selector and legacy mapping sections

fn-runPickActions.PURPOSE: Run SOURCE/LAYOUT selection actions from UI buttons
